extendedInfo.description: Welcome to Dream Fish, you are only taps away from owning multiple aquariums, where you can decide what fish to grow, to sell, and to breed!Raise beautiful baby Clown Fish, feed them to see them grow, and decorate your tanks with exotic tropical plants and sea reefs. Easy and simple as 1-2-3. (Donât forget to clean your tanks!)But what do you get when you breed?Blowfish + Clown Fish = ?Piranha + Yellow Longnose = ?Leafy Sea Dragon + Longfin Bannerfish = ?FEATURES:* Hundreds of exotic marine life including killer whales, sharks and sting rays* buy, feed, love, sell and revive your fish to gain experience* Breed your fish to your heart content and for extra coins* Level up to 80 tanks and 80 levels* Dozens of backgrounds including Atlantis and Stonehenge FREE!* Hundreds of decorations and plants: sea reefs, caves, mermaids, sunken ship and castles!* Visit / clean friend's tanks and level up to become "featured" neighbor tanksTags: Free games, Fun games, Free entertainment, Casual games, Online games, Aquarium, Aqua games, Wallpaper

reviews.title: Good support, they fixed my problem fairly quickly.
reviews.comment: Good support.
reviews.author: Matthew Roy

reviews.title: Love the new Dreamfish :-)
reviews.comment: I am very happy with all the new changes to Dreamfish and am loving all the quests and new fish. This is a great game and even though the transition from Tapfish to Dreamfish was a rough one I am happy with the new implementations.
reviews.author: Kathryn Dunagan

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I love this game is fun and it gives me something to do while my son naps.
reviews.author: alana puckett

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: Many more backgrounds, events, sales, fish & awards! Can really build some awesome tanks with additional decos! A step up from Tap Fish! Come & be a new neighbor!!
reviews.author: Sharon German

reviews.title: Felt good while it last.
reviews.comment: Im a little upset with dream fish game but not so much so that ill delete the game I because I can\'t lie the Team does look out for its players may take a few days if any but they do make sure were compensated as customers/players when we lose out on fish, FB\'s , Or anything that pertain to the game. So when contacting dream wavers studio have patients. They will get back to you ASAP & THAT YOU\'RE NOT THE ONLY PLAYER THEY HAVE WHO\'S HAVING TROUBLE WITH THEIR GAME! Still love dream fish.
reviews.author: Barbara Hawkins

reviews.title: Backgrounds
reviews.comment: I lost all my backgrounds that i have won doing the events at the last update. Please fix. I emailed you about it and still don\'t have my backgrounds back yet. Also when i go to the news on the menu and it says about sale items like right now it\'s piranha and guppy and Vegas i click on the go button and it tells me to restart game cause the stores aren\'t loaded correctly. Please fix these.
reviews.author: Heather Showers

reviews.title: Can\'t get it to work
reviews.comment: I have had to uninstall and reinstall the game 4 times and it still will not reopen. And when I try to contact them about the problem, when I hit send the message \"Invalid email address\" comes up. What the?? I never ever had trouble with Tapfish. Android OS 4.2.2
reviews.author: Carol Kendig

reviews.title: No Support, none!!!!
reviews.comment: I\'m learning ... To realize that I alone am the master of my $$$. And if I choose to spend it on FBucks, then I dare not complain about the cost. dream fish has kept me playing I think 2 yrs. Plus now :-)  it has consoled me during sad times, & busied the bored mind, but now that I need there help? There\'s no email I can send to get it. But They say were there 24/7 to help you..... ?????
reviews.author: Tammy Coulter

reviews.title: Great game.
reviews.comment: Great way to pass time. And can play game and succeed without spending actual money.
reviews.author: Linda Burke

reviews.title: Better but not perfect
reviews.comment: Good game, but the invite history comes up everytine you open it, that\'s annoying,.being able to change fish size is great, but needs to be tank specific, also fish grafic ratios need to be improved, orcas shouldn\'t almost be same size of jelly fish etc
reviews.author: Keith Schaar

reviews.title: I love this game
reviews.comment: I have been playing this for over 3 years now and i love it. I still call it tap fish but even without the updates i loved the game. The updates just make it better. Love my fishys :)
reviews.author: Jodie Petruzzelli

reviews.title: The fact.
reviews.comment: Excellent game it is. It engage people in constructive way. It helps people in experiencing their own fish tank especially for those who cannot have one.
reviews.author: Fatima Tul Zohra

reviews.title: Very good game
reviews.comment: Good game excellent also as well fantastic game good good good you should try it Wonderful game you should really really try it you\'re going to love it I promise you!!
reviews.author: michael wouters

reviews.title: Addictive!
reviews.comment: Better than before. Lots of events.
reviews.author: Kim Dellinger

reviews.title: Omfg. Pls STOP! THE Weekly updates!
reviews.comment: TOO MANY UPDATES!  Have been playing for two years but these twice-weekly updates are makung ne wsnt to UNINSTALL!! Geez, quit with so many updates...Irritating number of \"updates\"
reviews.author: Saunie Holloway

reviews.title: Fun! Fun! Fun!
reviews.comment: Only issue- not enough bucks :-(...other than that, wonderful
reviews.author: Norlena Collins

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Highly addictive and fun.
reviews.author: Elizabeth F

reviews.title: Step it up DreamFish!
reviews.comment: Need one more invite accepted to get 5bucks! I keep getting the same weekly bonus too..i hav three alligators. Perhaps u guys can giv fish bucks as rewards for the events? Or at least make an option to trade fish coins to bucks. I hav all the fish i can get with coins...so just playin evnts.  Bored.Will giv five stars wen I see some fishbucks.. PLZ..add ID: 9D7UGL seahorseunicorn  Happy Dreamfishing!
reviews.author: TINY TUNZE

reviews.title: Great game.
reviews.comment: I had this game for awhile.  I hated it on ky iPhone but I love it on the Galaxy!!!! Great job. Keep it up.
reviews.author: Nichole Miler

reviews.comment: Awesome game, fun for the whole family :-D
reviews.author: James Cogburn
